biotools.summary: An R package for the preparation and enrichment of health datasets for analysis. Provides functionality for assessing data quality and for improving the reliability and machine interpretability of a dataset. 'eHDPrep' also enables semantic enrichment of a dataset where metavariables are discovered from the relationships between input variables determined from user-provided ontologies.

bioschemas.name: eHDPrep
